title: Sticky pork BBQ ribs
ingredients: ['175ml pineapple juice', '125ml vegetable oil', '125ml white wine', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1.35kg baby back pork ribs or pork loin ribs.']
